entry.title: Procedure for non-tech contributions
entry.summary: Tom Geller, a writer and presenter from Oberlin, Ohio, has made his first contribution to the release notes of 0.9.0rc2 for the Bitcoin project. He shared this information on GitHub and provided a link to the pull request at https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/3787. Tom welcomes any corrections that may be needed and seems enthusiastic about his first contribution. In addition to his work with the Bitcoin project, Tom has experience in writing articles, marketing materials, creating videos, user guides, and books. His website, http://www.tomgeller.com, provides more information about his work as a writer and presenter.
